entry.title: Vitalik Proposes Soulbound Tokens as Web3 Credentials of the Future
entry.summary: Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin recently proposed a new kind of token standard that will help users gain insights into others’ real-world activities, accomplishments, likes and dislikes.

entry.title: The Age Of Tokies
entry.summary: Tokenized storytelling is the creation of decentralized content franchises owned by creators and patrons and orchestrated with tokens.

entry.title: OpenSea Drops New Marketplace Protocol for NFTs
entry.summary: OpenSea's new Seaport protocol will let users post offers for NFTs with a broad range of assets including ERC20, ERC721, and ETH.

entry.title: Milady NFTs Plummet As Founder Comes Clean
entry.summary: Milady is the most recent example of crypto-native art tarred by its creators’ dirty laundry.

entry.title: MakerDAO Regains Top Spot on TVL Leaderboard
entry.summary: MakerDAO is once again the largest DeFi protocol by Total Value Locked.
